component.name: DocCreator
component.summary: DocCreator is an application to generate synthetic document images

description.p: DocCreator allows to generate a large amount of synthetic document images. You can extract background, font and layout from existing documents. You can also create a synthetic document from scratch, choosing a background image and a font, and arranging the layout as you please.
Then, you can add various defects on the produce document images: bleed-through, ink defects, adaptive blur, holes, phantom characters, ...
DocCreator is useful for various DIAR tasks:

ul.li: it can help for performance evaluation tasks
it can also help for retrainning tasks
